body: Liam Halligan's loosen'd button is such a PLOY. I cannot hear his Words. #bbcqt

Well done Liam Halligan for #bbcqt appearance sadly can't agree that royals have a tough job or that we should spend (even) less on defence
Anyone else think that Liam halligan is a mixture of David Brent and Michael McIntyre. He's not letting starkey push him around #BBCQT

Oh God, this Liam Halligan chappie is poor. #bbcqt

Do we have to look at that left-wing greaseball Liam Halligan's chest hair all evening? #BBCQT

Liam Halligan uses the same Just for Men shade as Berlusconi and Gaddafi. #bbcqt
